scripts.build-dev: cp .env-dev .env && vue-cli-service build && npx http-server dist -p 9090 -P http://localhost:9090?
scripts.build-staging: cp .env-staging .env && vue-cli-service build && npx http-server dist -p 9090 -P http://localhost:9090?
scripts.build-prod: cp .env-production .env && vue-cli-service build && npx http-server dist -p 9090 -P http://localhost:9090?
